meanings.sent1: The talented muralists painted a beautiful scene on the city wall.
meanings.sent2: Many muralists gathered to work on the large mural in the park.
meanings.sent3: The muralists decided to paint a mural of a talking tree - quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: The muralists' brushes danced on the wall, bringing life to the dull surface.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the muralists' artwork glowed with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The group of artists who specialize in painting murals.
meanings.sent1: We visited the exhibition showcasing various talented muralists' works.
meanings.sent2: The muralists' association organized a community project to beautify the town.
meanings.sent3: The muralists' meeting turned into a colorful brainstorming session.
meanings.sent4: The city transformed into an outdoor gallery thanks to the muralists' efforts.
meanings.sent5: The muralists' creations told stories of the neighborhood's history.
